summary: An Ordinance approving the assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 1564, for the improvement of Dearborn Street, in the City of Seattle, from a point one hundred twenty (120) feet east of Twentieth Avenue South to Twenty-first Avenue South, by constructing a sewer therein of proper dimensions and materials, together with all necessary wyes, openings, manholes, lampholes, flush tanks, catch basins and other appurtenances, under Ordinance No. 16784 and assessing the amounts thereof against each parcel and lot of land and part thereof shown in said roll, and providing for the collection thereof.
